SEARCH
Package chessapi4j

Class Bitboard

java.lang.Object
chessapi4j.Bitboard
public class Bitboard extends Object
Wrapped bitboard class for several debugging or experimenting purposes. I don't recommend use it in high performance related functionality.
Since:
1.2.3
Author:
lunalobos

  • Method Details

    • and

      public static Bitboard and(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "and bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Parameters:
      bitboards - the bitboards to apply bitwise the operation
      Returns:
      a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of the "and" operation

    • or

      public static Bitboard or(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "or bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Parameters:
      bitboards - the bitboards to apply bitwise the operation
      Returns:
      a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of the "or" operation

    • xor

      public static Bitboard xor(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "xor bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Parameters:
      bitboards - the bitboards to apply bitwise the operation
      Returns:
      a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of the "xor" operation

    • shiftRight

      public static Bitboard shiftRight(Bitboard x, int shift)
      Performs a bitwise right shift (>>>) on the given bitboard.
      Parameters:
      x - the bitboard to shift
      shift - the number of bits to shift
      Returns:
      a new Bitboard object with the result of the shift

      Parameters:

      shift - the number of bits to shift
      Returns:
      a new Bitboard object with the result of the shift
